1301 Walnut Street
Grand Forks, N.D. 58201
May 23, 1967
Senator Warren G. Magnuson
Senate Office Building
Washington, D.C. 20510
Dear Senator Magnuson:
My wife and l should like to urge full support for Senate bill $.1160
(PUBLIC BROADCASTING ACT G- 1967). We see the passage of this act
as am important step forward in the area of educational broadcasting.
Unlike many, we do not oppose additional taxation if tnese funds
are used constructively rather than desrructively (we are strongly opposed
to the U.S. aggression in VIET NAM). This act is an excellent example
of the kind of project that should be supported by federal funds.
Yours truly,
Arthur P. Jacoby
